title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description:
Bug 7945: When performing a search for references to a field in an external jar (Build 200201151), the search results are not being selected. To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Open the project that contains the external jar.
2. In the IDE search functionality, enter the field name you want to search for (e.g. 'getTempDir').
3. Ensure that the search scope is set to include the external jar.
4. Click on the 'Search' button to initiate the search.

OB: Currently, no matches are selected in the search results.

EB: With this bug fixed, you should see 3 matches selected in the method 'getTempDir()'.

SR: 1. Open the project that contains the external jar.
2. In the IDE search functionality, enter the field name you want to search for.
3. Set the search scope to include the external jar.
4. Click on the 'Search' button to initiate the search.
5. Verify that 3 matches in the method 'getTempDir()' are selected in the search results.
